last_episode_to_air.overview: The Eclipse runs its course and comes to an end with catastrophic results. Everything has changed and nothing will be what it was.

name: Berserk: The Golden Age Arc – Memorial Edition
original_name: ベルセルク 黄金時代篇 MEMORIAL EDITION
overview: The lone mercenary Guts travels a land where a century-old war is raging. His ferocity and skill in battle attract the attention of Griffith, the leader of a group of mercenaries called the Band of the Hawk. Guts becomes Griffith’s closest ally and confidant, but despite all their victories, Guts begins to question why he fights for another man’s dream of ruling his own kingdom. Unknown to Guts, Griffith’s unyielding ambition is about to bestow a horrible fate on them both.

episodes.name: The Golden Age
episodes.overview: A young mercenary loner named Guts distinguishes himself in battle during a siege. As fate would have it, he also happens to catch the eye of Griffith, the charismatic young leader of the Band of the Hawk.

episodes.name: Nosferatu Zodd
episodes.overview: Griffith and the Band of the Hawk are rapidly gaining favor in the eyes of the king of Midland, but not everyone is pleased. During a battle, Guts and Griffith encounter an enemy like none they've ever faced.

episodes.name: Master of the Sword
episodes.overview: Griffith has Guts carry out a high-risk mission for him, while he himself grows better acquainted with Princess Charlotte.

episodes.name: Prepared for Death
episodes.overview: After being separated from the Band of the Hawk during a battle, Guts and Casca must fight for their lives against hostile Tudor forces.

episodes.name: Campfire of Dreams
episodes.overview: Guts begins to question his place in the Band of the Hawk, while Griffith puts the band in play for his riskiest gambit yet.

episodes.name: The Battle for Doldrey
episodes.overview: It's do-or-die time as the Band of the Hawk goes up against Tudor's mightiest knights in an attempt to recapture the fortress of Doldrey and bring the war to an end.

episodes.name: One Snowy Night
episodes.overview: The Hawks have their moment of glory as heroes of the kingdom, but Guts decides the time has finally come for him to pursue his own dreams alone.

episodes.name: Demise of a Dream
episodes.overview: Guts sets off on his own in a dramatic fashion, and this seemingly small event triggers what becomes a downward spiral for Griffith and the Hawks.

episodes.name: Wounds
episodes.overview: After a year has passed, Guts returns to find the Band of the Hawk reduced to a persecuted group of fugitives, with Casca as their acting leader.

episodes.name: Reunion in the Abyss
episodes.overview: When the Band of the Hawk infiltrates Windham to rescue Griffith from prison, what they discover upends all their plans and expectations.

episodes.name: The Eclipse
episodes.overview: As Griffith vacillates between desperate hope and hopeless despair, the Band of the Hawk is drawn into an event far beyond their comprehension.

episodes.name: Storm of Death
episodes.overview: Griffith makes one last fateful decision, as the rest of the Hawks struggle for survival against virtually insurmountable odds.

episodes.name: Vow of Retaliation
episodes.overview: The Eclipse runs its course and comes to an end with catastrophic results. Everything has changed and nothing will be what it was.
